text: throw confetti ! drop balloons ! give someone a snog ! what better way to welcome the new year than with a party , some good food or a burning boat ? and of course , few parties are as lavish , ridiculous or exhilarating as a new year 's eve party . whether it 's the champagne , the fancy dress , the delicious food , the spectacular location , amazing decorations , or the elusive promise of a kiss at the end of the night , new year 's eve is the pinnacle of the year 's social events calendar . that 's why this year we asked you to share your most memorable nye party shots from around the world . think you 've partied harder ? share your images with us on cnn 's ireport .
summary: few parties are as lavish , ridiculous or exhilarating as a new year 's eve party .   you shared your most spectacular party shots with us on ireport .
